definition: A "Werktag" refers to a day of the week that is typically associated with work or business activities. It is commonly used to describe any day from Monday to Friday, excluding weekends and public holidays.

examples.german: Am Wochenende habe ich frei, aber an Werktagen muss ich arbeiten.
examples.english: I have time off on weekends, but I have to work on workdays.

examples.german: Die meisten Geschäfte haben an Werktagen geöffnet.
examples.english: Most stores are open on workdays.
